unpublishedAction.name: insert_pdf_url

actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE finance_trip_invoices
  SET generated_pdf = {{
billing_format.data[0].Billing_format == 'lc'?
lc.data.download_url:
billing_format.data[0].Billing_format == 'trip'?
trip.data.download_url:
billing_format.data[0].Billing_format == 'date-loading-unloading'?
date_loading_unloading.data.download_url:
billing_format.data[0].Billing_format == 'date-lot-product'?
date_lot_product.data.download_url:
regular.data.download_url
}}
  WHERE invoice_number = {{appsmith.URL.queryParams.InvoiceNumber}}
	and status!= 'Invalid'

jsonPathKeys:
billing_format.data[0].Billing_format == 'lc'?
lc.data.download_url:
billing_format.data[0].Billing_format == 'trip'?
trip.data.download_url:
billing_format.data[0].Billing_format == 'date-loading-unloading'?
date_loading_unloading.data.download_url:
billing_format.data[0].Billing_format == 'date-lot-product'?
date_lot_product.data.download_url:
regular.data.download_url
